Description_lang: Mark a friendly player with Glimmering Dust, healing them for ${$s1*(1+$@versadmg)} every ${$t1}.1 sec for $d. If they fall below $s2% health, Glimmering Dust is consumed to grant them a shield that prevents ${(1+$@versadmg)*$346438s1} damage for $339516d.
AuraDescription_lang: Healing $w1 every $t1 sec. If you fall below $s2% health, this effect will be consumed to shield you.
